amendment.description: An amendment numbered 4 printed in Part B of House Report 116-247 to ensure FinCEN may use the information obtained by this bill to notify industry and the public about criminal trends, while maintaining safeguards on personal privacy.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 4 printed in Part B of House Report 116-247 to ensure FinCEN may use the information obtained by this bill to notify industry and the public about criminal trends, while maintaining safeguards on personal privacy.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Maloney, Carolyn B. amendment (A004) Agreed to by recorded vote: 235 - 188 (Roll no. 574).
